data.title: Exchange Recreation Center
data.text:
Click here to sign up for one of our many program's.

Click Featured Programs to view classes

Exchange - 2771 Columbia Drive, Decatur, GA 30034

Center Director- William Smith Phone - (404)687-3430

Center Leader-

Hours of Operation (Fall/Winter/Spring)

Monday thru Thursday: 7:00 p.m. to 9:00 p.m. Friday: 7:00 a.m. to 7:00 p.m.

Saturday: 9:00 a.m. to 3:00 p.m.

Sunday: Closed

Hours of Operation (Summer)

Monday thru Friday: 7:00 a.m. to 6:00 p.m.

Saturday: TBA

Sunday: Closed

Features and Amenities: Mutli-use fields, Tennis Courts, Playground, Lake, Trails, Multipurpose rooms, Large Gymnasium and Picnic Area
